comments: The genus Merckia Fisch. ex Cham. & Schlecht. is named after C.Merck.  Expedition Billings & Merk (1786-1793) to Siberia & Alaska.
examples: Polygonum humifusum C.Merck ex C.Koch in Linnaea, 22: 205 (1849).
source: Barnhart. Bull. Soc. Nat. Moscou, 61: 46 (1833). Trav. Mus. Bot. Acad. St. Petersburg, 4: 77; Dates & Variant name from: Hessische Biografie (via Lotte Burkhardt)
